name: Dog Ball 2 Chapter 1
description:
This video was rushed lol- it never came out for mobile.

Dog Ball 2 is a platformer game with ball physics. This project started in late 2020. It is based in the scratch engine (scratch-gui) and compiled in HTMLifier. (htmlifier)

This is Chapter 1 of the story. (aka an excuse for not finishing by the deadline because of procrastination) It consists of 4 levels. I am considering releasing a new one. I have been still working on that one.
